label: uncl4447
comment: Code specifying the format of free text.

values.label: Centre
values.comment: The associated text is centred in the available space.

values.label: Left
values.comment: The associated text item is aligned flush left in the available space.

values.label: Right
values.comment: The associated text is aligned flush right in the available space.

values.label: Justified
values.comment: The associated text is justified in the available space.

values.label: Preceded by one blank line
values.comment: The text is to be preceded by one blank line.

values.label: Preceded by two blank lines
values.comment: The text is to be preceded by two blank lines.

values.label: Preceded by three blank lines
values.comment: The text is to be preceded by three blank lines.

values.label: Continuation
values.comment: The text is a continuation of preceding text.

values.label: New page
values.comment: The text is to begin on a new page.

values.label: End text
values.comment: The text is the final section of the preceding text.

values.label: New line
values.comment: The text is to begin a new line.
